name: func_num_args
purpose: Returns the number of arguments passed to the function

return.description:
Returns the number of arguments passed into the current user-defined
   function.

errors: Generates a warning if called from outside of a user-defined function.

notes.description:
Because this function depends on the
current scope to determine parameter details, it cannot be used as a
function parameter. If this value must be passed, the results should be assigned
to a variable, and that variable should be passed.

changelog.change: This function can now be used in parameter lists.

If this function is called from the outtermost scope of a file
        which has been included by calling include
        or require from within a function in the
        calling file, it now generates a warning and returns -1.
